name: .ULP File Extension
summary: Learn about .ULP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open and edit a ULP file in Autodesk EAGLE (cross-platform) by selecting File → Open → ULP... from EAGLE's Control Panel. You can also open and edit a ULP file in any text or source code editor. Some editors, such as Notepad++ (Windows), offer extensions you can use to highlight ULP syntax correctly.
To run the program a ULP file contains, first open EAGLE's Schematic Editor or Layout Editor (whichever the program is meant to apply to). Then, select File → Run ULP....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
